metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16816 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The condor_schedd component in HTCondor before 8.6.8 and 8.7.x before 8.7.5 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) by leveraging use of GSI and VOMS extensions. It was discovered that HTCondor mishandled certain crafted input. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause HTCondor to crash.

criterions.comment: condor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
